General.Name: The Lovesac Company
General.Description: The Lovesac Company designs, manufactures, and sells furniture. It offers sactionals, such as seats and sides; sacs, including foam beanbag chairs; and other products comprising drink holders, footsac blankets, decorative pillows, fitted seat tables, and ottomans. The company markets its products primarily through lovesac.com website, as well as showrooms at top tier malls, lifestyle centers, mobile concierges, kiosks, and street locations in 40 states of the United States; and in store pop-up- shops and shop-in-shops. The Lovesac Company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut.
General.Address: Two Landmark Square, Stamford, CT, United States, 06901
